categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Echo Leader" was a male pilot that served in the Alliance to Restore the Republic during the Galactic Civil War against the Galactic Empire. Following the destruction of Alderaan, he served as leader of Echo Squadron and participated in a battle at Fostar Haven, where he flew a T-65B X-wing starfighter.
"Echo Leader" was a Rebel Alliance non-player character in the 2020 video game Star Wars: Squadrons.
